meanings.sent1: She overborrowed from the bank and now struggles to pay it back.
meanings.sent2: He tends to overborrow whenever he is in financial trouble.
meanings.sent3: The man overborrowed to buy a fancy car, but now he regrets it.
meanings.sent4: Her habit of overborrowing has put her in a deep financial hole.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of overborrowing can be severe and long-lasting.

meanings.sent1: The overborrowed student had a backpack full of books.
meanings.sent2: The overborrowed library card was used to check out too many books.
meanings.sent3: The overborrowed suitcase burst open from all the extra clothes.
meanings.sent4: The overborrowed plate was piled high with food at the buffet.
meanings.sent5: The overborrowed closet was overflowing with clothes she never wore.
